title: Hollow Tales Music Pack
description: Hollow Tales is the perfect soundtrack for games, films, or any project where a sense of magical darkness takes center stage. Get ready to make your project creepy in all the right ways.
longDescription:
Hollow Tales Music Pack is a collection of 11 original tracks that fill the air with mystery and suspense. With 43 files, including full compositions, stripped-down light versions, seamless loops, and bone-chilling stingers, this pack is crafted to turn your project into a haunting experience. Hollow Tales is the perfect soundtrack for games, films, or any project where a sense of magical darkness takes center stage. Get ready to make your project creepy in all the right ways.


This pack of royalty-free content includes; 

⦿ 11 x Original Music Track (including intros & outros)

⦿ 23 x Tracks including light versions and loops ( Long & short loop)

⦿ 9 x Stingers


Hollow Tales Music Pack is suitable for any game or film genre that features horror, suspense, tension, and eerie atmospheres.


This music pack includes these types of moods; 

⦿ Halloween Music Tracks

⦿ Dark Music Tracks

⦿ Spooky Music Tracks

⦿ Scary Music Tracks

⦿ Orchestral Music Tracks

⦿ Instrumental Music Tracks

⦿ Strange Music Tracks

⦿ Creepy Music Tracks

⦿ Eerie Music Tracks

⦿ Sneaky Music Tracks

⦿ Mysterious Music Tracks

⦿ Curious Music Tracks

⦿ Dramatic Music Tracks

⦿ Melodrama Music Tracks 


Total File Size: 2.02 GB

Format: 16bit, 44 kHz - 24bit, 48kHz

Number of Samples: 43 (for each sample rate/bit depth)

Available in 16bit, 44 kHz (game) and 24bit, 48kHz (video) versions 

Duration: 01:10:49 (hh, mm, ss)
